query: Run the Telegram and Discord adapters simultaneously and verify they handle messages independently
expected_behavior: Both adapters are registered in the ChannelManager and show as connected in gateway.status
A message sent via Telegram is routed only through the Telegram adapter's pipeline context
A message sent via Discord does not interfere with any in-flight Telegram response
A Telegram disconnection error is caught and logged without affecting the Discord adapter
The ChannelManager's getStatus() correctly reports each adapter's state independently
